detectors.description:

detectors.description:
AP.slitherConstructorVariables() (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d5b9954d0a8695f5394b53e386ace26084869f95_AP.sol#145-314) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- swapThreshold = _totalSupply / 10000 * 50 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d5b9954d0a8695f5394b53e386ace26084869f95_AP.sol#169)

	- [swapThreshold = _totalSupply / 10000 * 50](../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/d5/d5b9954d0a8695f5394b53e386ace26084869f95_AP.sol#L169)
